name: LOOP (Blue05)
description:
A short platformer game I made for Ludum Dare 47. Areas repeat themselves, and the goal is to make it through the endless void.

Programs I used: GameMaker Studio, Aseprite, Bfxr

Patch 1.0.0.1: A couple of bug fixes. Fixed an bug where the game wouldn't enter fullscreen and fixed an issue where the audio was a lot louder than intended. I've made sure I followed Ludum Dare's rules regarding updates and bug fixes, but the old version will still be available.
